statement.p: The graph below shows the distance a cat is from his bowl of milk over time. Which sentence is a good match for the graph?Â

ol.li: The cat was 20 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 4 seconds.
The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 4 feet per second.
The cat was 20 feet away from the milk and ran away from it at a rate of 4 feet per second.
The cat was 4 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 20 seconds.
The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 5 feet per second.

ul.li: E: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 5 feet per second.
